name: Rave Enforcer
description: Implanted subdermal LEDs pulse with hypnotic rhythm. Swings a reinforced baton synchronized to their internal beat-generator.
motivesAndTactics: intimidate, bully, steal, protect
attackDescription: This is not what the crowbar was meant for!

name: Dockworker with Grease Stains
description: A heavy-lifting laborer used to moving crates, not dodging bullets.
notes: Knows cargo schedules, smuggling habits, and who pays extra for quiet.
motivesAndTactics: Prefers to shout and posture first; if provoked, swings hard and fast until the threat backs down.
attackDescription: A wide, heavy punch like swinging a crate hook at someone's jaw.

name: Autonomous Combat Drone (Ground)
description: A quadrupedal drone built for stability and pursuit.
motivesAndTactics: Advance aggressively and pin targets.

name: Autonomous Guard Bot
description: A compact bipedal bot with nonlethal and lethal options.
motivesAndTactics: Patrol and challenge intruders directly.

name: Ex-gang Member Trying to Stay Clean
description: A former ganger with old scars and enough discipline to try another life.
notes: Has history with local crews and may still be on some lists.
motivesAndTactics: Avoids violence but will stand their ground when pushed, protecting bystanders before themselves.
attackDescription: A practiced brawling punch that can drop an unprepared opponent.

name: Quiet Ganger
description: A low-level gang member watching, listening, and reporting back to someone meaner.
notes: Has ties to a local crew and can call in trouble if offended.
motivesAndTactics: Stays calm and observant, then strikes hard and fast or signals allies if things escalate.
attackDescription: A practiced stab with a short gang knife at close range.

name: Ex-military Veteran
description: A former soldier with outdated chrome and ingrained tactical reflexes.
notes: Understands small-unit tactics, ambushes, and how corps wage war.
motivesAndTactics: Assesses threats quickly, takes cover, and focuses on disabling the most dangerous target first.
attackDescription: A practiced combination of strikes leveraging training and cybernetic strength.

name: Corp-Spec Guard Android
description: A humanoid android built for facility defense.
motivesAndTactics: Advance methodically and neutralize threats.

name: Security Mech Frame
description: A compact exosuit used by facility defense teams.
motivesAndTactics: Advance aggressively and control space.

name: Automated Barricade Deployment System
description: Deployable steel plates with integrated weapon pods.
motivesAndTactics: Block access and fire while advancing.

name: Pattern-Touched Beggar
description: Unpredictable, mumbling fragments of pattern phrases. Carries improvised weapons. Presence causes mild psychic static in their vicinity.
motivesAndTactics: confuse, disorient, convert, suborn
attackDescription: Your brain is squeezed from the inside

name: Automated Machinegun Turret
description: A ceiling-mounted ballistic turret with automated targeting.
motivesAndTactics: Track heat signatures and suppress intruders.

name: Micro-Missile Sentry Pod
description: A compact pod that fires guided micro-missiles.
motivesAndTactics: Target high-threat intruders with precision missiles.

name: Sonic Disruption Cannon
description: A high-frequency sonic weapon for hallways and chokepoints.
motivesAndTactics: Break formations and scatter intruders.

name: Washed-up Mage
description: An older mage whose power is frayed but not gone, haunted by past contracts.
notes: Knows occult hotspots, mana anomalies, and old rituals that still work.
motivesAndTactics: Tries to warn people off first; uses low-grade spells at range and avoids getting surrounded.
attackDescription: A short-range burst of disruptive magic that sears nerves and focus.

name: Rail-Slug Wall Cannon
description: A wall-embedded railgun firing armor-piercing slugs.
motivesAndTactics: Target high-value intruders with extreme lethality.

name: Auto-Targeting Sniper Node
description: A rooftop precision node with thermal scope and rail-lens.
motivesAndTactics: Eliminate intruders at long distance.

name: Heat-Seeking Micro-Rocket Turret
description: A compact turret firing miniature guided rockets.
motivesAndTactics: Track heat signatures and strike fast.

name: Burned-out Decker
description: A hacker whose nerves and implants are half-shot but who can still think sideways when pressed.
notes: Has basic access to local low-tier systems and backdoor knowledge.
motivesAndTactics: Avoids physical confrontation, uses positioning and environment; only fights if their exit is blocked.
attackDescription: A short-range jolt from a cheap stun baton or taser module.

name: Diner Regular with Backpack
description: A regular who treats the booth like a second home and the backpack like a lifeline.
notes: Carries most of their worldly possessions and knows who comes and goes.
motivesAndTactics: Keeps their head down until threatened, then fights to protect their pack and escape.
attackDescription: Uses the heavy backpack as a swinging club.

name: Explosive Decoy Crate
description: A booby-trapped storage crate meant to lure thieves.
motivesAndTactics: Explode when tampered with or scanned incorrectly.

name: Glassmask Lookout
description: Wears a cracked, reflective faceplate that hides identity and displays looping memetic patterns. Uses a cheap pistol and a signal whistle tied to Abraxas-pattern frequencies.
motivesAndTactics: hide, flank, divide, profit, escape

name: Joyrider Biker
description: A thrill-seeker with a neon bike and a habit of outrunning trouble.
notes: Knows back alleys, ramps, and chase routes through the district.
motivesAndTactics: Plays it cocky, striking once and then disengaging at speed if things look bad.
attackDescription: Cracks a helmet or fist into a target at close range.

name: Local Courier
description: A street courier hauling parcels and data chips through dangerous blocks on a tight schedule.
notes: Knows routes, choke points, and safe paths between districts.
motivesAndTactics: Prefers to evade and outrun threats; will strike once to create an opening and then bolt.
attackDescription: A sharp elbow to the ribs while pushing past an obstacle.

name: Micro-camera
description: A fixed or pinhole surveillance camera tied into local or corporate feeds.
motivesAndTactics: observe; record

name: Off-duty Prostitute Sipping Coffee
description: A nightlife worker off the clock, dressed down and keeping a low profile in the corner booth.
notes: Has good knowledge of local rumors and regulars.
motivesAndTactics: Watches exits and people, tries to de-escalate or slip away; fights only when trapped.
attackDescription: A quick stab from a concealed blade or improvised sharp.

name: Personal Drone
description: A small consumer drone used for recording, courier work, or selfies.
motivesAndTactics: hover; record; evade

name: Silent Alarm
description: A covert pressure plate, trip laser, or sensor that signals quietly when crossed.
motivesAndTactics: trigger silent alert

name: Smart Claymore Charge
description: A directional explosive with smart detonation logic.
motivesAndTactics: Detonate when line-of-sight criteria met.

name: Street Kid with Scavenged Cyberware
description: A young survivor with mismatched implants and sharp survival instincts.
notes: Understands alleys, shortcuts, and who really owns the streets.
motivesAndTactics: Acts fast and dirty, using distraction and hit-and-run tactics before disappearing.
attackDescription: A fast punch or kick aimed below the belt while the target is distracted.

name: Streetlamp (Surveillance)
description: A city lamp post with embedded micro-camera and networked control.
motivesAndTactics: illuminate; monitor; flag activity

name: Autonomous Combat Drone (Aerial)
description: A hovering drone armed with light kinetic weapons.
motivesAndTactics: Perform hit-and-run aerial sweeps.

name: Corporate Courier
description: A sleek courier trusted to move sensitive packages between secure sites.
notes: Carries encrypted cargo and knows backdoor routes through corporate territory.
motivesAndTactics: Avoids conflict with precision; uses speed and environment to break line of sight, striking only to open an escape.
attackDescription: A fast kick to the knee or shin to slow pursuit.

name: Electro-Pulse Mine
description: A mine that generates an EMP combined with neural shock.
motivesAndTactics: Trigger during clustered movement.

name: Fixer's Messenger
description: A trusted courier carrying coded instructions, often underestimated until too late.
notes: Serves as the eyes and ears of a more powerful fixer.
motivesAndTactics: Observes before acting, then strikes with speed; prefers to disengage and report rather than slug it out.
attackDescription: A quick, quiet knife strike meant to end a problem before it starts.
experienceName: Open a connection to their fixer

name: Illegal Cybertech Dealer
description: A back-alley tech who can source implants the corps pretend do not exist.
notes: Maintains contacts with smugglers, clinics, and street docs.
motivesAndTactics: Prefers to bargain and stall, using cover and tricks; fights dirty when escape is blocked.
attackDescription: A precise stab or jab aimed at weak points learned from anatomy work.

name: Microdrone Swarm Dispenser
description: Deploys a cloud of needle-equipped microdrones.
motivesAndTactics: Overwhelm targets with numbers and distraction.

name: Monofilament Perimeter Wire
description: meleely invisible monofilament strands stretched across chokepoints.
motivesAndTactics: Slice through intruders who rush unsafely.

name: Remote-Triggered Nanoshard Mine
description: A mine that releases cutting nanoshards on detonation.
motivesAndTactics: Detonate remotely to deny routes.

name: Runner Doing Fixer Errands
description: A low-tier runner carrying someone else's package and reputation.
notes: Acts as a contact point for a more powerful fixer and knows drop spots.
motivesAndTactics: Calculated and cautious, uses cover and retreats strategically, but will commit to quick decisive strikes.
attackDescription: A sudden close-quarters strike with a concealed knife or shock weapon.
experienceName: Establish a link to their fixer

name: Security Ripper-Drone
description: A rotary-blade drone designed for close-quarters interception.
motivesAndTactics: Rush soft targets and harass flanks.

name: Choir of Glass knifer
description: Carries a shard knife, low-end AR visor, and a pocket speaker that emits disorienting tones.
motivesAndTactics: harass, intimidate, threaten, convert
attackDescription: He slashes at you with a glass knife

name: Electronic Door Lock
description: A secured access panel using RFID, biometrics, or encoded credentials.
motivesAndTactics: block access; log entries

name: Security Drone
description: A light patrol drone with sensors and loudspeaker, more watcher than fighter.
motivesAndTactics: patrol; track; call backup

name: Public Service Bot
description: A low-autonomy cleaner or maintenance bot trundling along fixed patrol routes.
motivesAndTactics: clean; repair; avoid hazards

name: Late-shift Worker Eating Breakfast
description: A tired worker grabbing a meal before or after a long shift, clothes stained with the day's labor.
notes: Generally avoids trouble unless cornered.
motivesAndTactics: Wants to eat in peace and get back to work; will try to talk their way out or flee before fighting.
attackDescription: A hurried punch with a mug or plate when threatened.

name: Sleep-deprived Student
description: A wired student juggling coursework and side gigs to stay ahead of debt.
notes: Has access to campus networks and niche research knowledge.
motivesAndTactics: Panics under direct threat and lashes out once before trying to flee or hide.
attackDescription: A clumsy swing with a backpack or tablet.

name: Corp Intern With Tablet
description: A junior employee juggling tasks on a company-issued slate, still believing in promotion ladders.
notes: Has limited but current information on corp projects and culture.
motivesAndTactics: Avoids conflict at all costs; will yell for help or hide behind authority figures.
attackDescription: A nervous swipe with the tablet or a kick at the shin.

name: Body-mod Enthusiast
description: A citizen proudly displaying fresh cosmetic and functional augments.
notes: Knows clinics, mod artists, and rumors about black-market cyberware.
motivesAndTactics: Likes to show off and talk big; if provoked, uses augments for quick jabs or shoves.
attackDescription: A reinforced punch or shove leveraging implanted strength.

name: Drunk Salaryman
description: A corporate employee several drinks past their limit and several hours past their shift.
notes: May let slip confidential details without realizing it.
motivesAndTactics: Staggers and blusters, swings once or twice before collapsing or retreating.
attackDescription: A wide, unsteady punch powered more by momentum than skill.

name: Augmented Street Performer
description: A performer using tasteful luminous augments to turn bodies and light into art.
notes: Draws crowds, hears chatter, and can mask other activity with a show.
motivesAndTactics: Uses agility and misdirection, turning acrobatic moves into strikes or escapes when threatened.
attackDescription: A spinning kick or flip that doubles as both attack and escape.

name: Off-duty Security Guard
description: A corp-contracted guard off shift, still wired to read a room like a threat board.
notes: Knows security protocols, patrol routes, and how corp response teams operate.
motivesAndTactics: Tries verbal commands first, then precise takedowns; aims to control rather than kill.
attackDescription: A controlled strike and grapple aiming to put the target on the ground.

name: Echo Runner
description: Constant noise maker in combat.  Drops a beat and then beats on you
motivesAndTactics: harass, confuse, dance, mobility, escape

name: Smartphone / Commlink
description: A personal mesh-enabled comms and data device carried by almost everyone.
motivesAndTactics: communicate; store data

name: Holo-terminal
description: A stand-alone terminal for public info, orders, or corp interface sessions.
motivesAndTactics: display data; accept input

name: AR Projector
description: A small projector that paints augmented reality overlays into local space.
motivesAndTactics: project overlays; distract

name: Environmental Sensor
description: A node that monitors air, chemical, or mana conditions and reports anomalies.
motivesAndTactics: detect anomalies; report

name: Matrix Relay Node
description: A mesh-network repeater extending wireless coverage through a location.
motivesAndTactics: extend signal; route traffic

name: Smart Appliance
description: An automated household or industrial unit with simple task routines.
motivesAndTactics: perform routine; malfunction

name: Desk Console
description: A seated corporate workstation with encrypted shells and limited privileges.
motivesAndTactics: process jobs; store records

name: Medical Scanner
description: A diagnostic scanner for vitals, implants, and basic nanotech assays.
motivesAndTactics: scan biometrics; log results

name: Payment Terminal
description: A credstick or palm-scan payment unit tied to identity and ledger systems.
motivesAndTactics: authenticate; record transaction

name: Neon Sign Controller
description: A control box regulating local neon signage and ambient lighting.
motivesAndTactics: cycle signage; signal status

name: Emergency Call Beacon
description: A wall-mounted beacon that pings responders and logs distress calls.
motivesAndTactics: raise alarm; tag location

name: Vehicle Node Interface
description: A diagnostic and control port for local vehicles, often melee parking.
motivesAndTactics: lock down; unlock; start systems

name: Wearable Tech
description: A personal HUD, smart ear augment, or wrist display tied into the mesh.
motivesAndTactics: display feeds; capture sensor data

name: Laser Tripwire Grid
description: A fixed-beam laser intrusion grid that activates lethal countermeasures when crossed.
motivesAndTactics: Detect movement and trigger ambush responses; holds area denial patterns.
attackDescription: Emit a focused burn pulse at the meleeest intruder.

name: Shock-Floor Conduction Plates
description: Conductive plates that deliver incapacitating shocks.
motivesAndTactics: Activate on pressure or remote trigger; immobilize intruders.

name: Taser Web Launcher
description: A wall unit that fires electrified capture webs.
motivesAndTactics: Immobilize intruders before alerting security.

name: Thermal Motion Detector
description: A heat-tracking sensor node with defensive shock emitters.
motivesAndTactics: Monitor temperature anomalies and alert reinforcements.

name: High-Voltage Security Door
description: A fortified door that shocks unauthorized contact.
motivesAndTactics: Hold positions and punish forced entry.

name: Entrapment Foam Ejector
description: A wall device that sprays hardening restraint foam.
motivesAndTactics: Disable movement and hold intruders.

name: Ceiling-Drop Restraint Mesh
description: A ceiling-mounted mesh trap that drops onto targets.
motivesAndTactics: Restrain and immobilize intruders quietly.

name: Ceiling-Drop Restraint Mesh
description: A silent restraint mesh that drops from overhead panels.
motivesAndTactics: Capture intruders in chokepoints.

name: Down-on-his-luck Corporate Drone
description: A burned-out office worker whose badge still works in a few places, even if their paycheck does not.
notes: May still have low-level corp access codes or contacts.
motivesAndTactics: Motivated by survival and a chance to climb back up; folds quickly under real threat.
attackDescription: Swings a heavy briefcase or satchel in panic.

name: Tired Paramedic on Break
description: A medic between calls, uniform rumpled and eyes red from too many nights on duty.
notes: Carries basic medical gear and knows recent casualty hot spots.
motivesAndTactics: Focuses on protecting the injured and avoiding casualties; only attacks to disable a direct threat.
attackDescription: A rapid jab with a sedative injector meant to drop a hostile without killing.

name: Synthetic-food Vendor
description: A stall owner selling steaming trays of reconstituted everything to anyone with cred.
notes: Hears all kinds of gossip from regulars and passing crews.
motivesAndTactics: More interested in protecting their stall than winning fights; throws things or calls for help.
attackDescription: Hurls a hot pan or liquid to burn and distract.

name: Undercity Preacher
description: A street preacher calling for hope in places the corps forgot.
notes: Knows the mood and needs of the local community and its hidden corners.
motivesAndTactics: Tries to defuse violence with words; only fights to protect vulnerable people meleeby.
attackDescription: A quick strike with a walking staff or heavy book.

name: Conspiracy Vlogger
description: A streamer convinced the world runs on hidden patterns, some of which are disturbingly accurate.
notes: Collects data, rumors, and footage that can expose or implicate powerful groups.
motivesAndTactics: Threatens to broadcast everything if cornered, uses gear and noise to distract while escaping.
attackDescription: Swings a reinforced camera rig into an attacker's face.

name: Awakened Kid
description: A young person whose latent power makes lights flicker and air hum when they get emotional.
notes: Acts as a sensor for strange energies and hidden phenomena.
motivesAndTactics: Avoids direct conflict; lashes out reflexively with bursts of uncontrolled energy when frightened.
attackDescription: A small uncontrolled pulse of magic that shocks meleeby threats.

name: Elderly Shopkeeper
description: An older proprietor who has seen entire crews rise and vanish from their storefront.
notes: Knows long-term neighborhood history and who owes favors to whom.
motivesAndTactics: Prefers stern words and quiet pressure; resorts to hidden weapons only when absolutely necessary.
attackDescription: A sudden strike with a weighted cane or concealed baton.

name: Hostile Intruder Spray Unit
description: A chemical dispersal node that emits irritants or neuro-gas.
motivesAndTactics: Disperse crowd-control or disabling agents.

name: Guardrail Jackpot Trap
description: Conductive rails delivering concussive shockwaves.
motivesAndTactics: Channel intruders into kill-zones.

name: Chemical Mist Neutralizer
description: A dispersal unit that emits paralytic or disorienting mist.
motivesAndTactics: Fill hallways with disabling agents.

name: Portable Auto-Barricade
description: A mobile barricade drone deploying armored plates.
motivesAndTactics: Reinforce positions and obstruct movement.

name: Street Medic
description: A combat-capable medic patching up people the official system leaves to die.
notes: Has medical supplies, trauma knowledge, and dirt on who gets hurt where.
motivesAndTactics: Focuses on stabilizing others; will target aggressors' joints or nerves to end fights quickly.
attackDescription: A precise strike to a nerve cluster to stun or drop a foe.
